com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.ts

Class Ac3Reader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.ts.Ac3Reader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ElementaryStreamReader 

    public final class Ac3Reader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ElementaryStreamReader
    Parses a continuous (E-)AC-3 byte stream and extracts individual samples.

      • continueRead

        private boolean continueRead(ParsableByteArray source,
                             byte[] target,
                             int targetLength)
        Continues a read from the provided source into a given target. It's assumed that the data should be written into target starting from an offset of zero.
        Parameters:
        source - The source from which to read.
        target - The target into which data is to be read.
        targetLength - The target length of the read.
        Returns:
        Whether the target length was reached.

      • skipToNextSync

        private boolean skipToNextSync(ParsableByteArray pesBuffer)
        Locates the next syncword, advancing the position to the byte that immediately follows it. If a syncword was not located, the position is advanced to the limit.
        Parameters:
        pesBuffer - The buffer whose position should be advanced.
        Returns:
        Whether a syncword position was found.

      • parseHeader

        private void parseHeader()
        Parses the sample header.
